statements: SELECT closure_id, closure_date, closure_reason, detour_route, estimated_duration FROM road_closures;
SELECT closure_id, closure_reason, closure_date, estimated_duration, detour_route FROM road_closures;
SELECT closure_date, closure_reason, estimated_duration, closure_id, detour_route FROM road_closures;
SELECT closure_reason, estimated_duration, closure_id, closure_date, detour_route FROM road_closures;
SELECT detour_route, closure_date, closure_reason, closure_id, estimated_duration FROM road_closures;
SELECT closure_id, closure_date, closure_reason FROM road_closures WHERE closure_id = 1;
SELECT closure_id, closure_reason, estimated_duration FROM road_closures WHERE estimated_duration > 60;
SELECT closure_id, closure_date, detour_route FROM road_closures WHERE closure_reason = 'Construction';
SELECT closure_reason, closure_date, detour_route FROM road_closures WHERE closure_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY closure_date DESC;
SELECT closure_id, closure_date, estimated_duration, detour_route FROM road_closures WHERE estimated_duration BETWEEN 30 AND 90 ORDER BY closure_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM road_closures;
SELECT closure_id, road_name, closure_type FROM road_closures WHERE closure_type = 'Planned';
SELECT closure_id, road_name, start_date, end_date FROM road_closures WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT closure_id, road_name, reason FROM road_closures WHERE reason LIKE '%emergency%';
SELECT detour_id, detour_name, detour_type, duration_hrs FROM construction_detours WHERE duration_hrs > 5;
SELECT closure_id, road_name, closure_type, start_date, end_date, reason FROM road_closures;
SELECT * FROM construction_detours WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT detour_name, detour_type FROM construction_detours ORDER BY start_date DESC, duration_hrs ASC;
SELECT road_name, COUNT(closure_id) AS num_closures FROM road_closures GROUP BY road_name HAVING COUNT(closure_id) > 1;
SELECT road_name, detour_name FROM road_closures JOIN construction_detours ON road_name = detour_name WHERE closure_type = 'Planned' AND detour_type = 'Alternative';
SELECT road_name FROM road_closures WHERE closure_id = 1;
SELECT closure_id, reason FROM road_closures WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2021-12-01';
SELECT * FROM construction_detours WHERE construction_reason = 'Heavy Traffic';
SELECT detour_name, end_date FROM construction_detours WHERE start_date < '2022-02-01';
SELECT location, issue_description FROM maintenance_issues WHERE reported_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT closure_id, road_name, start_date, end_date, reason FROM road_closures WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT detour_name, start_date, end_date FROM construction_detours WHERE construction_reason = 'Road Repaving' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT issue_id, location, issue_description, reported_by FROM maintenance_issues WHERE location = 'Main Street' AND issue_description LIKE '%pothole%'
SELECT closure_id, road_name, start_date, end_date, reason FROM road_closures WHERE reason IN ('Accident', 'Natural Disaster') AND end_date < '2023-06-30';
SELECT detour_name, start_date, end_date FROM construction_detours WHERE detour_name LIKE '%Highway%' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM road_closures;
SELECT location, reason, start_date, end_date FROM road_closures ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT id, detour_route, distance FROM detours WHERE distance > 5 ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_events WHERE location LIKE '%highway%' AND end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, location, description, accident_date FROM accidents ORDER BY accident_date DESC, reported_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM road_closures WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location, reason FROM road_closures WHERE reason LIKE '%construction%';
SELECT detour_route FROM detours WHERE distance > 5 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT location, description FROM maintenance_events WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT location, accident_date FROM accidents WHERE accident_date > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY accident_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM road_closures;
SELECT closure_id, road_name, start_date FROM road_closures ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT detour_id, origin_road, destination_road FROM detours WHERE detour_duration > '01:00:00';
SELECT accident_location, accident_description FROM accidents WHERE accident_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT work_description FROM road_works WHERE start_date < '2022-10-01' AND end_date > '2022-09-01';
SELECT * FROM road_closures WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT closure_id, road_name, closure_reason FROM road_closures WHERE closure_reason = 'Construction';
SELECT road_name, start_date, end_date FROM road_closures ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM detours WHERE detour_length > 5.0 AND detour_duration > '00:30:00';
SELECT detour_id, origin_road, destination_road FROM detours WHERE detour_length > 2.0 ORDER BY detour_length ASC;
